t: Tax on Low Value Imported Goods (LVIG) - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon is obligated to calculate, collect, and remit Sales Taxes including Value Added Tax (VAT), Goods and Services Tax (GST), and others, on low-value imported goods (LVIG) classified as taxable for each relevant jurisdiction.
